title: godoc broken in 3ee58453e961+ tip
body:
by **ehog.hedge**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. update go to 3ee58453e961+ tip
2. rebuild
3. run godoc -http=:9999

What is the expected output?

  godoc runs and serves on 9999.

What do you see instead?

BOOM.

panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

panic PC=0x7f804b6fcc70
runtime.panic+0xb2 /home/chris/GoRoot/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1028
       runtime.panic(0x55b800, 0x7f804b266360)
panicstring+0x69 /home/chris/GoRoot/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:83
       panicstring(0x79e1eb, 0x2c00000001)
runtime.panicslice+0x25 /home/chris/GoRoot/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:50
       runtime.panicslice()
go/doc.CommentText+0x63d /home/chris/GoRoot/src/pkg/go/doc/comment.go:83
       go/doc.CommentText(0x7f804b266a20, 0x60000000d, 0x516e54, 0xd)
main.*treeBuilder路newDirTree+0x8b0
/home/chris/GoRoot/src/cmd/godoc/dirtrees.go:136
       main.*treeBuilder路newDirTree(0x7f804b7e28f0, 0x7f804b145b20,
0x7f800000001e, 0x7f804b2ad8d8, 0x6, ...)

       main.*treeBuilder路newDirTree(0x7f804b7e28f0, 0x7f804b2c51e0,
0x7f8000000017, 0x7f804b762d53, 0x4, ...)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
Which operating system are you using?
Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

6g, linux, 3ee58453e961+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.

Looks like the problem is in doc/comment.go at line 83; code starting at line
80 is

      // Add final "" entry to get trailing newline from Join.
       // The original loop always leaves room for one more.
       if n > 0 && lines[n-1] != "" {
               lines = lines[0 : n+1]
               lines[n] = ""
       }

I note code above this is now using append & wondered if the "always 
leaves room" invariant had been invalidated. As an experiment I 
replaced the lines

       lines = lines[0 : n+1]
       lines[n] = ""

with
       lines = append( lines, "" )

and rebuilt. Problem went away.
